name: Aim Lab VR
description:
Experience the #1 FPS Trainer in a whole new dimension! And, it’s still free! Grab the benefits from top tasks in Aim Lab including Gridshot, Spidershot, Microshot, Strafetrack, Sixshot, Spidershot, and Aqua Tile Frenzy. Full with their own VR specific leaderboards to champion. Utilize the flicking and tracking skills across other FPS VR games you play.

The fun doesn’t stop there, by popular demand our exclusive League of Legends Arcane task featuring Jinx’s Arcade is available as a playable experience. If you loved the show, you’ll love this! Got what it takes to challenge Jinx? Try for yourself.

Enjoy the sounds of the official VALORANT Champions theme “Die for You” ft. Grabbitz in our beautifully crafted music rhythm task featuring captivating environments that rotate in phases to reflect the agents Brimstone, Phoenix, and Sage. Hit the targets on the beat and enjoy the music!

Finally, survive the night during the Targets of Terror. Endure waves of enemies (who are now super scary in VR) while battling through to protect yourself.
